abstract.text: A pass-through node used for visually routing edges in the graph.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The Dot node is only visual; it has no effect on its input or output. Use the Dot node to make a graph more readable and visually appealing.

abstract.text: Create custom materials and effects for 3D content in Reality Composer Pro.
Modify the visual flow of data within your graph without changing any values.
A pass-through node used for visually routing edges in the graph.
